    • init_edit_form

      public void init_edit_form(Appointment a) throws Exception
      Initializes the appointment edit form by populating form fields. Uses 2 lambda expressions to loop through contacts and customers to preselect comboboxes.
      Parameters:
      a - The Appointment object used to prepopulate the edit form.
      Throws:
      Exception
